ygData.subject: New friends in the forest
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone wandered around Kilthkor lately?  Saw some names just hanging in the air.  Shadow men.   Targeted one, conned blue.  Five of them, one of me, so I did
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone wandered around Kilthkor lately? Saw some
names just hanging in the air. Shadow men. Targeted
one, conned blue. Five of them, one of me, so I did
the smart thing, I charmed one then ran like hell. My
motto to this point has been, if you can't be safe, be
fast. But for the first time since I got the speed
song, something odd happened. At level 30, with the
Mistmoor Drum, I was getting hit from behind. A lot.
For 30-50pts each. That was a new and frighting
experiance. I'm hoping it was a bug. Zoned out with
half a bubble and a racing heart. Anyone else take on
these little inviso guys? I hear there's more stuff
now in our spooky liitle woods, can anyone verify.

Llewrewnd Lynnhaven
